Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

XMIDI Sequence Branch (109)

Discussion

This controller forces an immediate and unconditional branch to the location of a Sequence Branch Index (120) controller with the same controller value. Its action is identical to that of the AIL_branch_index function. For more information on XMIDI sequence branching, refer to the AIL_branch_index function description and the MDI_ALLOW_LOOP_BRANCHING preference description. Also see the description of the Sequence Branch Index controller below.

Next Topic (XMIDI Channel Lock (110))

Previous Topic (XMIDI Callback Prefix (108))


Group: Extended MIDI Technical Reference
Related Functions: AIL_branch_index
Related Basic Types: MILES_PREFERENCES
